/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A white van is parked on the right side of the street, its presence adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise serene setting. 

On the left side of the street, a building stands tall, its facade adorned with a red awning that adds a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, their white forms contrasting beautifully against the blue expanse. 

The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful day in a bustling city, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
